gx Package¶

dockable_expression Module¶

@author: Nelso G. Jost @email: nelsojost@gmail.com @project: VISUINO - A visual programming toolkit for Arduino

class visuino.gx.dockable_expression.NotchPath(start_point=None, size=(50, 100), shape='trig')¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QPainterPath

Path with shapes for the left/right puzzle-like slots.

This path uses relative points so it can be easily connected to others paths. It was design for use as male RIGHT connector, and female LEFT.

class visuino.gx.dockable_expression.CornerPath(origin, place, size, style='rect')¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QPainterPath

Path for nice and easy corner drawings, with various shapes supporting.

Just give it the corner point of the destination shape, and then it will figures out the relative dimensions and creates the path. Then you can append this with the destination path.

class visuino.gx.dockable_expression.GxShapeNotchLeft(notch='rect', scene=None, parent=None)¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QGraphicsItem

boundingRect()¶
paint(painter, option=None, widget=None)¶

field_info Module¶

Attributes:
name:str. Used for text label in arguments.

__init__

VALID_TYPES = ['int', 'float', 'char', 'const']¶
getWidget(parent=None)¶

Returns the proper widget for what is configured in self.widget attribute. The default widget is QLineEdit().

Parent :QWidget() <None>.
